requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some features may be limited by the amount of memory available, notably when hosting a match, the number of opponents you can play against. Shared graphics memory will require more system memory.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Multicore
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: At least 4GB of graphics memory in addition to memory for the game, does not need to be VRam.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: When hosting a match with computer opponents, additional cores will prevent them from taking longer to play their goes as the game progresses. Memory requirements are related to the number of players.

results.name: Five Nights With Fat Herobrine REBOOT
